https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/xd84EJ8vhJTJCLIWjI3kZbItaJr.jpg Emre, a young and dedicated prosecutor, is newly appointed to a small town hit by a water crisis and political scandals. After an initial welcome, he experiences an increasing number of tense interactions and is reluctantly dragged into local politics. When Emre forms a bond with the owner of the local newspaper pressure escalates under heated rumours. Burning Days
